column1: # Input for match_and_merge.r script by kristoffer.johansson@bio.ku.dk

# The output will be a data frame per library with a column per row in the samples section; i.e. per selection-replicate pair containting read counts per library member summed for technical replicates
# Section to give pairs of options and values
# Section to list libraries that samples should be matched to (if any). Include control sequences using the name 'controls'
# Section to list sample files. All technical replicates should be given in same row
